incident_updates.body:
Dear Worldline Customer,

We would like to inform you we have scheduled a maintenance window to focus on improving the performance, stability and security of our solution. These activities will take place February 4th between 10:00 PM to 3:00 AM PT. During this time, there may be a total of 15 minutes intermittent processing downtime.

Maintenance Window Details:
Date: 02/04/2025
Start Time: 10:00 PM PT
End Time: 3:00 AM PT
Impact: Up to 15 minutes of intermittent processing downtime.

We apologize for any inconvenience and appreciate your patience. If you have urgent questions or concerns, please reach out to our Customer Support team via email support.na@worldline.com or by calling 1-833-226-2672.

incident_updates.body:
Dear Worldline Customer,

We would like to inform you we have scheduled a maintenance window to deploy updates as part of our ongoing efforts to enhance the performance, stability and security of our solution. These activities will take place on February 11th 10:00 AM to 1 PM PT. Minor impact is expected as a result of this maintenance window.

Maintenance Window Details:
Date: 2/11/2025
Start Time: 10:00 AM PT
End Time: 1:00 PM PT
Impact: Up to 15 intermitted minutes of increased response times

We apologize for any inconvenience and appreciate your patience. If you have urgent questions or concerns, please reach out to our Customer Support team via email support.na@worldline.com or by calling 1-833-226-2672.

Thank you,
Worldline Customer Support
